name: event-hub
description: Pub/Sub service, which automatically fires events/messages of the life cycle of an operation (start/process/done).

scripts.test: npm run clean-coverage; FORCE_COLOR=true babel-node node_modules/.bin/isparta cover --report text --report html _mocha -- --recursive --full-trace --es_staging --harmony --check-leaks --compilers js:babel-register -c -R spec ./src/**/*.spec.js | cat
scripts.reset: npm run clean; npm run clean-coverage; rm -rfv node_modules/

author: G JING <gjing@tibco-support.com>
